comment.author: 18532986@N07
comment._content:
"Silver Queen"
Consolidated B-24J-145-CO Liberator
s/n 44-40148
344th BS, 98th BG, 15th AF

Front Row (L-R):
Wilson Rapp - Navigator
Ray Smith - Co-Pilot
Jack Stevens - Pilot
Bill Voss - Bombardier

Back Row )L-R):
Oscar Cushing - Ball Turret Gunner
Walter Bohnenstiehl - Radio Operator
Louis Marcarelli - Engineer (KIA,July 22,1944)
Herb Vaughn - Top Turret Gunner
Don Good - Waist Gunner
Ben Bertalot - Tail Gunner

This crew was originally assigned to the 791st BS, 467th BG, 8th AF.
